explanation.important: delete the explanation and leave only the first three values (user_location, destination_location and mode)
explanation.user_location: location of the Users folder, if it is not correct, you can correct it here
explanation.destination_location: folder where you want the saves to be saved. The SAVES folder will be created inside it
explanation.mode: choose between collect or spread. collect gets all the saves, spread spreads them to your computer
